name: Redux (Grim)
description:
My first little visual novel and my exam project for my Game Design Degree.

A story about a world where people have been given game-like classes such as “Mage” or “Tank” and must use the powers of that class to repel monsters that regularly attack the world. The game follows a group of people who have successfully defeated the Overlord, the root of all the monsters, and are now casually clearing out the remains of the Overlord’s army.

Consider this chapter one and two with chapter three being a strong maybe...

Music by Possum!
